thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 13 of 3253
thread.title: Mark Keith

author: Mark Keith
title: Mark Keith
text: The pickup point at Heathrow is not specified on the voucher so I call on the phone. As I call from Hong Kong the phone defaults to Cantonese, which I do not speak. They person answers with Cantonese accent, she cannot explain the pick up or bus details, her supervisor comes on the phone and explains everything very nicely. It gives me concerns about the processes, assumptions and lack of empathy inherent in the company.
